content:
Based on the provided logs, I'll generate a report summarizing the existing structures and error tips.

EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Smelting Area (Position 0,0)
Consists of two stone furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace 2 at position (2.0, 0.0)
Both furnaces are processing copper ore into copper plates

### Iron Smelting Area (Position 4,4)
- Stone furnace at position (4.0, 4.0) processing iron ore into iron plates

### Electronic Circuit Production Line (Position 6.5-12.5, 11.5)
Complex assembly line consisting of:
- Input chest at position (6.5, 11.5) storing iron plates
- Burner inserter at position (7.5, 11.5) moving items from input chest to assembling machine
- Assembling machine at position (9.5, 11.5) crafting electronic circuits
- Burner inserter at position (11.5, 11.5) moving finished products
- Output chest at position (12.5, 11.5) storing iron plates, copper plates and electronic circuits

### Power Generation System (Position -9.5 to -2.5, 24.5)
Steam power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe network connecting water flow
- Boiler at position (-7.0, 24.5)
- Steam engine at position (-2.5, 24.5)
- Connected electric poles distributing power

### Science Pack Storage/Lab System (Position 0.5, 28.5-31.5)
- Burner inserter at position (0.5, 30.5)
- Storage chest at position (0.5, 31.5) containing automation and logistic science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Issues
- Monitor inventory capacity before attempting to harvest resources
- Clear inventory space when receiving "Inventory is full" errors

### Container Capacity Issues
- Monitor chest capacities before attempting large insertions
- When inserting items, check if target container has sufficient space

### Crafting Errors
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft items
- Verify recipe requirements and ingredient availability before crafting

### Resource Placement Issues
- Check if required items are in inventory before attempting to place entities
- Verify placement location is valid and clear before attempting to place structures
